column5: Our Hideaway at Windy Oaks is a 4 bedroom ranch house, situated on 125 acres of wooded pasture, 17 easy miles southwest of Canton, Texas, home of the famous First Monday Trade Days.  We open our ranch house to guests from Thursday, before First Monday, through Tuesday, after First Monday, every month.  Although we have 7 ponds for your enjoyment, Purtis Creek State Park, known for bass fishing, is just 10 miles south of the ranch
